SingleChoiceOption.label: Clock Route Order
SingleChoiceOption.Description: Specify clock assignment order for clock net, except clock net generated by clock primitive.The default is 0. 0: ordered by fanout. 1: ordered by clock frequence.

SingleChoiceOption.label: Run Timing Driven
SingleChoiceOption.Description: When enabled, timing driven optimization of the placement and routing is performed.

SingleChoiceOption.label: Route Option
SingleChoiceOption.Description: Route algorithm options. 0: default route algorithm, the default route algorithm according to congestion. 1: route algorithm 1, routing according to timing. 2: route algorithm 2, routing speed will be faster.

IntegerOption.label: Route Maxfan
IntegerOption.Description: Set the guideline for routing fanout-based optimizations.

SingleChoiceOption.label: Correct Hold Violation
SingleChoiceOption.Description: Controls whether the routing will automatically insert additional wires to correct the hold violation on the affected registers, but the auto-correction affects the setup time. If the setup is more critical, turn off this option. The default is True.
